name: habify-app
description: A full-stack habit tracking app with Django backend and React frontend

scripts.build: cd interface && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd interface && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "python manage.py runserver" "cd interface && npm start"
scripts.install-deps: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd interface && npm install

author: Your Name
